story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1101_0100_20:
And now, the block A second match
everyone’s been waiting for!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1101_0200_20:
It’s Katy, the Sugarbug, who feasts on
victory—fluttering her way into the arena!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1101_0300_20:
She’s battling the rock-solid Pokémon
Trainer, Brock!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1101_0400_20: And here’s the second match of block B!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1101_0500_20:
It’s the Verdant Virtuoso, Brassius! Show us
the artistry of your moves!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1101_0600_20:
How will Misty, the Tomboyish Mermaid, take
him on?!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1101_0700_20:
This second match will decide our finalists!
Ready...battle!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Allow me to test the depth of your
imagination!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Don’t underestimate me! I know all about
Sudowoodo!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_1000_10:
It might look like a Grass-type Pokémon...
But it’s actually Rock type!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Starmie’s got the advantage! Too bad
for you!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_1300_10:
What a rigid, unimaginative mind you have!
It seems you can only see things from one
perspective!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_1400_10: You should cultivate an eye for art!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Wh-what?! What part of what I said
was wrong?!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_1600_10: Allow me to bestow true art upon you!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Art is creation and destruction! Struggle, else
your defeat will nourish my Pokémon!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_1900_10: Ursaring, huh. That Pokémon packs a punch.
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_2000_10:
But if it’s using Normal-type moves, it won’t
be effective against my Onix!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_2100_10:
True! That’s a tad too tough for my sweet
little bear.
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Decoration time, my little Ursaring! Let’s get
you some antennae and bug you up!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_2400_10:
It...Terastallized?! You changed your
Pokémon’s type!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I see. So that’s how you beat Roark’s
Rock-type Pokémon!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_2700_10:
But we’ll smash you like a cake with our
decorative moves—before your Rock-type
attacks can get us!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_2800_10:
At times, art becomes a race against the
clock! Let us complete this piece!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Why so surprised? We’re used to Grass-type
moves by now!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_3100_10:
When you’re a Gym Leader, folks come at
you with Pokémon and moves that target
your weaknesses!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Hahahahaha! You have a point, you clever
little mermaid!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_3400_10: It seems I’m the one who lacked imagination!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_3500_10:
You finally get it! But now, it’s our turn!
We’ll show you how artistic water can be!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_4000_10:
My buggy little bear’s decorative moves
don’t seem to be dealing much damage!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_4100_10: Katy, in case you didn’t know...
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_4200_10:
Pewter City is right next to Viridian Forest,
where bug Pokémon live.
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_4300_10:
A lot of Trainers who come to challenge me
bring bug Pokémon they caught there and
trained up!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_4500_10: Ah ha ha! It itches! It itches!
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_4800_10:
What a shame! You made quick work of
us! But...
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_4900_10:
If your Onix got THIS strong by training
against Viridian Forest bugs...
story_arceus_08_10000/2401_1001_5000_10: then I’d love to visit one day!
